title: LF ADC DIAMOND 5 + For SumSoc OCS tournament
body:
Greetings all

I am looking for a solid adc main with teams experience to play for us in the SumSoc OCS tournament. We won the last one and are keen to grab a new adc because the former parted ways with us. Hoping to look for anyone Diamond 5 above.

-Must have a mic
-previous team experience
-Mature player (no trolling or toxic behaviour)
-Willing to practice and improve

We are a bunch of lads and I am sure you will enjoy playing with us a lot!! If your interested please add "rageblade"

Cheers
